title: Bug 4166DCR: Javadoc for implementers of a method (1GJJ5LD)
description: Bug 4166DCR: Javadoc for implementers of a method (1GJJ5LD)
OB: If I hover over a method which implements an interfaceor overrides a method I would like to see the correspondingJavadoc (unless I also added my own Javadoc).NOTES:
